tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE fashion_events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(255),
    event_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    guest_list TEXT,
    runway_looks JSON
)

CREATE TABLE guest_list (
    guest_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    show_id INT,
    guest_name TEXT,
    guest_email TEXT,
    guest_category TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE runway_looks (
    look_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    show_id INT,
    designer_id INT,
    outfit_description TEXT,
    outfit_price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE event_reviews (
    review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    show_id UUID REFERENCES fashion_show_schedule(show_id),
    guest_id UUID REFERENCES guest_list(guest_id),
    rating INTEGER,
    review_comment TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE fashion_events (
    event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name TEXT,
    event_date DATE,
    venue_location TEXT,
    event_type TEXT
);
